  4. "Secrets Behind the Origins" A 1-1/2 column text piece on the histories of Blackhawk and El Diablo by unknown.

Note:
name: Citizen Jan / Folk Tales

description: The Shadow stalks a deadly killer while his agents face their own dangers in "The Lord of Death."
name: The Lord of Death!

description: Veto Skreemer's secret...and curse...revealed. The story concludes, tracing his life from its bloody beginnings to the equally bloody end of the Age of Giants.
name: Part Six: Finnegan's Wake

description:
1. Cover by Fred Butler and Malcolm Jones III.
  2. "Howling Bones" written by Doug Moench, penciled by Fred Butler, inked by Gonzalo Mayo, colored by Robbie Busch and lettered by Jonnie Mac.

Notes:

  • Story takes place in Bucks County, which is located in Southeastern PA.
name: Howling Bones

description: Aiding Argus of the Nasgul, who's under attack by a ship from the Nasgul fleet, could prove disastrous for the Enterprise and her crew when the Salla finds out what's happening in "The Return!" Continued next issue.
name: The Return!

description: Picard and Riker land on the planet Raimon to attend the death celebration of the planet's Primarch, but Picard is witness to more than he expects in "Return to Raimon." Continued next issue.
name: Return To Raimon

description: "Deadline Doom!" In Las Vegas to help a friend, Starman comes face-to-face with Deadline, a mysterious super-powered assassin.
name: Deadline Doom!

description:
Lashina reveals all while the Squad takes the scenic tour of Armagetto and has the fight of their lives. Also, Amanda Waller versus Granny Goodness.

Lashina and the Suicide Squad arrive on Apokolips and engage in combat with Granny Goodness and the Female Furies. Meanwhile, back on Earth, Bronze Tiger works to assemble a rescue team.
name: Armagetto

description:
"Laugh...I thought I'd Die!" Guest-starring the Guardian. The Prankster's back, and unless the Man of Steel can get to the hospital on time, Morgan Edge may not survive the goofy villain's latest practical joke.

Notes:

  • On pages 2-3 panel 4 Kirby Salvage is a homage to Jack Kirby.
  • Cameo flashback appearances of Thanagarians, Lex Luthor, Baron Sunday and Jimmy Olsen as Elastic Lad.
  • Superman appears as Gangbuster in a cameo flashback appearance.
  • Chronological continuation in Adventures of Superman #459.
name: Laugh... I Thought I'd Die!

description:
Only Iron Munro and Dyna-Mite stand between the Sons of Dawn and the destruction of an entire city.

Notes:

  • Iron Munro, Hugo Danner and Dyna-Mite appears in the story.
  • The remainder of the characters have cameo appearances.
  • This issue shows Phantom Girl with the All-Star Squadron but the next issue shows Miss Liberty with the group.
name: When Titans Make War...

description: After finding about his father, Airboy decides to go to Miserys realm and try to end the evildoers reign once and for all in The Damned and the Dead.
name: The Damned And The Dead

description: Badger and Mavis travel to Bolivia to research Indian cures with donkey dung, but get more than they bargained for when they arrive during Tinku.
name: Tinku

description: In "Like The Gods Themselves", Martin Weiss is a man with super-speed comprehension. He sees the world move before him in slow motion, and wants to use his power for the force of good. What happens when you can see the world... faster than you can move? Marc and Sepulchreplan their escape. The brooding mystery of Tawny Winters continues.
name: Like The Gods Themselves

description: Puck of Alpha Flight, who has been in the Liveworld since he helped hold Dreamqueen there, is able to view into the reality that Alpha Flight is currently inhabiting as they fight the super-heroes in a fascist America. Since the realm of Liveworld can conform to his thoughts, he uses that power to come to Alpha Flight's aid. After the fantastic battle, Alpha Flight realizes they aren't on Earth and were always on Liveworld, due to the intervention of Llan the Sorcerer. Talisman is able to figure out a way to open a gateway to the real Earth and they finally return home with Puck in tow.
name: Tigers In The Rain

description: Has Paladin gone crazy? He's hired himself out to Carlton Drake and his Life Foundation!
name: Under War

description: Hawkeye finds himself up against Trickshot, Mad-Dog, Bobcat, Bombshell, the Brothers Grimm - in fact everyone he's fought ever since SOLO AVENGERS #1! The Vision crashes the Tonight Show and late-night television may never survive the experience! Guest-starring Johnny Carson, Ed McMahon, William Shatner, Pee-Wee Herman, and Charo.
name: Tooth & Nail; Second Debut

description: To save Gilgamesh, the Avengers must get him to his home in Olympia. Trouble is, Olympia has vanished!
name: Journey

description:
There's a Bloodstone fragment in South America. And to get it, Captain America must survive 'The Wheel of Death!' USAGENT VERSUS SCOURGE Part II USAgent discovers just how deadly Scourge really is!

  • "Wheel of Death" featuring Captain America and Diamondback
  • "Night of the Scourge, Part 2: Death Calling" featuring U.S. Agent
name: Wheel of Death

description:
Daredevil takes a stand against inhumane treatment of animals, when he helps a young ecologist take down her father's slaughter farm. But darker secrets lurk inside the barn, secrets that, if unleashed, would raise moral questions too grisly to answer!

Skip and his assistant, Harry walk though his pig and chicken farm. Harry points out how the animal rights people are giving them trouble for how the farm treats its animals. Skip blows him off, saying he has more pressing concerns then the animals welfare.Skip then goes downstairs to meet with his secret scientists. He checks on their progress with the engineered chickens and his wife to be, Number nine a cheerleader who volunteered to made into the perfect woman.

Meanwhile Daredevil meets Brandy, Skip's daughter, who convinces the hero to help her liberate the animals in her father's farm. They save the animals, but mistakenly and unknowingly release number nine from her tank.
name: Genetrix

description: Kitty is cast under a spell to be a proper princess in order to marry Prince William. Can Excalibur save their teammate from a frilly and obedient fate?
name: The Cross-Time Caper, Part 2: The marriage of true minds
